meanings.definition: A rich Hungarian stew made with meat and paprika.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother cooked a delicious gulas for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served traditional gulas that warmed my belly.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled gulas on my shirt, and it looked like a messy masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering gulas filled the entire house with comfort.
meanings.sent5: The gulas bubbling in the pot looked like a magical potion brewing.

meanings.definition: A type of red pepper used in Hungarian cuisine.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a pinch of gulas to add a spicy kick.
meanings.sent2: The market had fresh gulas that added vibrant color to the dish.
meanings.sent3: I mistook the gulas for a regular bell pepper and my dish turned out fiery!
meanings.sent4: The intense flavor of the gulas transformed the bland soup into a culinary delight.
meanings.sent5: The gulas added a burst of heat to the dish, awakening my taste buds.
